title: Luxembourg Retail Sales MoM
description: Retail Sales in Luxembourg increased 0.80 percent in September of 2022 over the previous month. Retail Sales MoM in Luxembourg averaged 0.21 percent from 2000 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 36.50 percent in May of 2020 and a record low of -68.20 percent in August of 2015. In Luxembourg, the month-over-month change in Retail sales compares the aggregated sales of retail goods and services during a certain month to the previous month. This page provides - Luxembourg Retail Sales MoM - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: EUROSTAT
